title: Unlocking Bali's Best Kept Secrets for Free
content: # Unlocking Bali's Best Kept Secrets for Free  As I sit on my balcony overlooking the turquoise waters of Seminyak Beach, I'm reminded that one of the best things about living in Bali is its affordability. From delicious street food to world-class yoga classes, there's no shortage of ways to experience the island without breaking the bank.  But let's be real – finding the best spots and deals can be a challenge for expats and digital nomads. That's why we're excited to introduce our new email newsletter, Bali Time Out. By signing up, you'll get access to insider knowledge on everything from hidden beaches to local festivals, all delivered straight to your inbox.  One of our favorite perks is the exclusive guide to free activities in Bali. From hiking up volcanic mountains to exploring ancient temples, there's no shortage of ways to experience the island without spending a dime. We've scoured the island to bring you the best tips and tricks for making the most of your time in Bali on a budget.  But it's not just about saving money – we're also passionate about showcasing the very best of Balinese culture and lifestyle. From traditional dance performances to local art markets, our newsletter will take you on a journey through the sights, sounds, and flavors of this incredible island.  So what can you expect from Bali Time Out? Here are just a few highlights:  * Insider tips on the best beaches, restaurants, and bars in Bali * Exclusive deals and discounts on everything from yoga classes to surf lessons * A curated selection of local events and festivals to add to your calendar * A community forum for expats and digital nomads to connect and share their experiences  To get started, simply click this link to sign up for our email newsletter. It's completely free, with no spam or sales pitches – just the inside scoop on all things Bali.  We can't wait to welcome you to the Bali Time Out community!
